11#ifndef VPX_VP9_ENCODER_VP9_SEGMENTATION_H_
12#define VPX_VP9_ENCODER_VP9_SEGMENTATION_H_
13
14#include "vp9/common/vp9_blockd.h"
15#include "vp9/encoder/vp9_encoder.h"
16
17#ifdef __cplusplus
18extern "C" {
19#endif
20
21void vp9_enable_segmentation(struct segmentation *seg);
22void vp9_disable_segmentation(struct segmentation *seg);
23
24void vp9_disable_segfeature(struct segmentation *seg, int segment_id,
25 SEG_LVL_FEATURES feature_id);
26void vp9_clear_segdata(struct segmentation *seg, int segment_id,
27 SEG_LVL_FEATURES feature_id);
28
29void vp9_psnr_aq_mode_setup(struct segmentation *seg);
30
31void vp9_perceptual_aq_mode_setup(struct VP9_COMP *cpi,
32 struct segmentation *seg);
33
34// The values given for each segment can be either deltas (from the default
35// value chosen for the frame) or absolute values.
36//
37// Valid range for abs values is (0-127 for MB_LVL_ALT_Q), (0-63 for
38// SEGMENT_ALT_LF)
39// Valid range for delta values are (+/-127 for MB_LVL_ALT_Q), (+/-63 for
40// SEGMENT_ALT_LF)
41//
42// abs_delta = SEGMENT_DELTADATA (deltas) abs_delta = SEGMENT_ABSDATA (use
43// the absolute values given).
44void vp9_set_segment_data(struct segmentation *seg, signed char *feature_data,
45 unsigned char abs_delta);
46
47void vp9_choose_segmap_coding_method(VP9_COMMON *cm, MACROBLOCKD *xd);
48
49void vp9_reset_segment_features(struct segmentation *seg);
50
51#ifdef __cplusplus
52} // extern "C"
53#endif
54
55#endif // VPX_VP9_ENCODER_VP9_SEGMENTATION_H_
56
